modules.description: This module implements DNS query operations using the macOS DNS Service Discovery API. It provides functions to create queries for specific domain names and record types, wait for responses using system event mechanisms like `select` or `kqueue`, and retrieve or cancel query results. It works directly with DNS resource records and Unix domain sockets, enabling precise control over asynchronous DNS resolution and service discovery.

This module performs DNS queries using the macOS DNS Service Discovery API, supporting operations to resolve domain names into resource records like A, AAAA, or TXT. It works with DNS resource record types and domain names, returning results as lists of records or errors. Concrete use cases include resolving service addresses for local network services and retrieving DNS records programmatically on macOS systems.
